description: STRING No. 45 // From 2019-04-01 // Walk Away is inspired by the book ‘Walk Away’ by Cory Doctorow. The paintings are layering strong imagery on top of each other and is supposed to be understood as a landfill for symbols of the past and contemporary culture. In this cultural dumpster all pictures are clustered together at the same axis.
materials: Acrylic and interference paint on canvas
name: WALKAWAY IV/IV
